hero.description_1: // Specialization: Building robust architectures with Laravel.
hero.description_2: // Major Upgrade: Migrating core engine to {target}.
hero.description_3: // Focus: Performance, code integrity and high availability.

about.title: ARCHITECTING_SYSTEMS. NOT_JUST_APPS.
about.bio_1: Based in Kolwezi, DRC, I forged my initial expertise in the PHP ecosystem, engineering complex ERPs and marketplace backends.
about.bio_2: I am currently in a major recalibration phase: migrating my technical base towards Go and containerized workflows. I believe that code is just a component; architecture is the engine.

logs.detail: Laravel ecosystem mastery. First deployments of enterprise-grade ERP systems.
Standardizing data REST flows for high-load multi-vendor platforms.
Transitioning core modules to Go and Docker for scalable performance.
